plays.text: Penalty to Tobias Enstrom 2 minutes for Slashing Nathan Horton
Goal scored by Olli Jokinen (Power Play) assisted by Brett McLean
Penalty to Joel Kwiatkowski 2 minutes for Tripping Ville Peltonen
Penalty to Jassen Cullimore 2 minutes for Interference Slava Kozlov
Goal scored by Jeff Dwyer assisted by Niclas Havelid
Penalty to Mark Recchi 2 minutes for Hooking Steve Montador
Penalty to Stephen Weiss 2 minutes for Slashing Bobby Holik
Penalty to Bobby Holik 2 minutes for High-sticking Gregory Campbell
Goal scored by Jay Bouwmeester unassisted
Goal scored by David Booth assisted by Magnus Johansson and Nathan Horton
Penalty to Ilya Kovalchuk 2 minutes for High-sticking Steve Montador
Penalty to Bryan Allen 2 minutes for Hooking Jim Slater
Goal scored by Mark Recchi assisted by Jeff Dwyer
Penalty to Jay Bouwmeester 2 minutes for Holding Ilya Kovalchuk
Penalty to Jay Bouwmeester 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
